alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 29 at 2:52PM CDT until October 29 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jackson County in southern Mississippi... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 252 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Gautier, or near Moss Point, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Moss Point, Escatawpa, Gautier, Vancleave, Hickory Hills and Helena. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 57 and 72. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for southern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for southern Mississippi.
